name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Bundle
name_original: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Bundle
description:
The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

- Tiny Troopers: Global Ops
- Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops
- The ‘Tiny Tales’ Comic Book
- The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Original Soundtrack

Tiny Troopers: Global Ops

Attention! Tiny Troopers: Global Ops is a fast-paced arcade twin-stick shooter in which you lead an elite squad of Tiny Troopers on action-packed missions to take down hordes of unscrupulous enemies from all corners of the world!

Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops XL

Tiny Troopers Joint Ops is an epic bite-sized arcade shooter, filled to the brim with action-packed mini maps of mayhem!

Take control of your tiny troopers as you battle evil adversaries from around the world with a multitude of weapons. Recruit specialist mercenaries such as Medics, Machine Gunners and the Elite Delta Force to subdue enemy insurgents! Collect medals, dog tags, Intel and more during the course of each mission to ensure victory.

Tiny Tales Comic

Join forces with Botch, Geordie, Soup and Kid, the elite soldiers handpicked by the esteemed Commander for the T.A.L.O.N squad as they embark in miniature warfare on a global scale. Written by Special Gun Productions, featuring artwork by João Bonito, 'Tiny Tales' takes readers right into the heat of battle in a twenty-eight page explosive comic book based on the action-packed twin-stick shooter, Tiny Troopers: Global Ops.

Official Soundtrack

The Tiny Troopers: Global Ops Official Soundtrack brings the battle-hardened heroes to the ultimate rave in eight electrifying tracks. With original sound by Ed Fokks, featuring remixes by Kieron Pepper, GooseWing, Rob Pearson and Cramer, avid listeners will be transported throughout an epic campaign covering six theaters of war. From frozen winter tundras to scorching desert landscapes, each track is inspired by the in-game locations of this action-packed, twin-stick shooter.
